original: de'i lan du ma skyes dgra la sogs pas mtshams med pa byas pas bsam pa chung du dang 'bring po dang chen po'i rim pas mnar med par bskal pa chung du 'am nyung du 'am phyed du gnas par 'gyur ba las de dag phyis shin tu 'gyod pa'i
analyzed: de'i lan du ma skyes dgra la sogs pas mtshams med pa byas pas bsam pa chung du dang 'bring po dang chen po'i rim pas mnar med par bskal pa chung du 'am nyung du 'am phyed du gnas par 'gyur ba las de dag phyis shin tu 'gyod pa'i
translated: In response, Ajātaśatru and so on committed heinous acts, but due to the differences in their mental states, weak, medium, and strong, they will remain in Avīci for a small, medium, or half eon.

original: mes gdungs pa'i sems kyis 'gyod nas bshags pa'i mthus las de bsrabs par gyur te /
analyzed: mes gdungs pa'i sems kyis 'gyod nas bshags pa'i mthus las de bsrabs par gyur te /
translated: Later, their minds tormented by the fire of regret, they confessed their sins.🔽Through the power of confession, their karma was reduced and they experienced the results of their suffering for the time it takes to snap one’s fingers.

original: gang pho long brdabs pa'i dus tsam du sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu myong bar gyur to zhes gsungs na de ci de tsam gyis kyang las rnams shin tu rtsa ba nas 'byung bar mi @196b 'gyur ba ma yin te 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang pho long brdabs pa'i dus tsam du sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu myong bar gyur to zhes gsungs na de ci de tsam gyis kyang las rnams shin tu rtsa ba nas 'byung bar mi @196b 'gyur ba ma yin te 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is so, then is it not the case that karma is completely uprooted by that alone?

original: ci sog ma gcig chod pas sog ma kun brdabs par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: ci sog ma gcig chod pas sog ma kun brdabs par 'gyur ram /
translated: Is it the case that when one blade of grass is cut, all blades of grass are cut?

original: gang gsungs pa /
analyzed: gang gsungs pa /
translated: What was said?

original: bskal pa brgya dag snyed du yang //
analyzed: bskal pa brgya dag snyed du yang //
translated: Even for hundreds of eons,

original: las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te //
translated: karmas do not perish.

original: tshogs dang dus dang ldan pa na //
analyzed: tshogs dang dus dang ldan pa na //
translated: When the assemblage and time are right,

original: lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin //
analyzed: lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin //
translated: they ripen as results for embodied beings.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
translated: How is this known?

original: rnam par 'gyod pa la sogs pa spyod pa'i mthus las gang dag mngon par ma sbyangs shing bsrabs par ma byas pa de dag ni bshad pa'i chos 'di yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'gyod pa la sogs pa spyod pa'i mthus las gang dag mngon par ma sbyangs shing bsrabs par ma byas pa de dag ni bshad pa'i chos 'di yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the karmas that have not been purified and reduced by the power of engaging in remorse and so on are the dharmas that are explained.

original: de ltar yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de ltar yang gsungs pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: mi shes pas ni sdig pa chung byas 'og tu 'gro //
analyzed: mi shes pas ni sdig pa chung byas 'og tu 'gro //
translated: Through ignorance, even a small sin leads to the lower realms.

original: mkhas pas nyes pa che byas kyang ni yang bar 'gyur //🔽bsgongs pa'i lcags ni chung yang chu yi 'og tu 'byings //
analyzed: mkhas pas nyes pa che byas kyang ni yang bar 'gyur // bsgongs pa'i lcags ni chung yang chu yi 'og tu 'byings //
translated: Through wisdom, even a great fault becomes light.🔽A small iron ball sinks in water,

original: de nyid snod du byas na che yang steng na 'phyo //
analyzed: de nyid snod du byas na che yang steng na 'phyo //
translated: but the same iron made into a vessel floats.

original: zhe'o // nges par mi myong ba'i dus gsum gyi sdig pa'i las bgrang ba las 'das pa de yang las kyi dbang gis phyogs bcu kun du skad cig gis 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du rgyun du ngan song gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i
analyzed: zhe'o // nges par mi myong ba'i dus gsum gyi sdig pa'i las bgrang ba las 'das pa de yang las kyi dbang gis phyogs bcu kun du skad cig gis 'khor ba'i mtha'i bar du rgyun du ngan song gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i
translated: Even the limitless sins of the three times, which are beyond enumeration, are experienced in the three lower realms, in all the ten directions, for as long as cyclic existence lasts, by sentient beings born there.

original: phyir de dag gi ris dang rgya dang kha dog dang dbyibs dang tshad rnams tha dad par 'bras bu rnam par smin par gdon mi za bar ro myong bar mi byed do //
analyzed: phyir de dag gi ris dang rgya dang kha dog dang dbyibs dang tshad rnams tha dad par 'bras bu rnam par smin par gdon mi za bar ro myong bar mi byed do //
translated: But the various kinds of their realms, sizes, colors, shapes, and measures are not experienced as the results of karma, because they are not definitely experienced.

original: dge ba'i las kyis kyang sogs pa'i 'bras bu smin par bya nus pa'i mthu 'di ltar yongs su 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dge ba'i las kyis kyang sogs pa'i 'bras bu smin par bya nus pa'i mthu 'di ltar yongs su 'byung ngo //
translated: The power to ripen the results of virtuous karma also arises in this way.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba las byang chub nyid du smon lam gyi mthus bsngos shing /
analyzed: 'bras bu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba las byang chub nyid du smon lam gyi mthus bsngos shing /
translated: The results of karma that will ripen are dedicated to enlightenment by the power of aspiration.

original: gdon mi za bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za bar byed pa'o //
translated: They are definitely made to be that way.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i mi g-yo ba'i las bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i rgyu de'i stobs nyid kyang de las bzlog ste /
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i mi g-yo ba'i las bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i rgyu de'i stobs nyid kyang de las bzlog ste /
translated: The power of the cause of the karma of the form and formless realms, which is the meditative concentration of the absorptions, is the opposite of that.

original: las la dbang bas sems can gyi don du gar dga' bar sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: las la dbang bas sems can gyi don du gar dga' bar sbyor ba ste /
translated: By the power of karma, one is able to apply oneself as one wishes for the sake of sentient beings.

original: 'di ni dag par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dag par byed pa'o //
translated: This is the purification.

original: nyon mongs stobs rnams kun du 'joms par byed //
analyzed: nyon mongs stobs rnams kun du 'joms par byed //
translated: It destroys all the powers of the afflictions.

original: ces bya ba ni lus dang sems kyi rgyud snyon rmongs par byed pa ni nyon mongs pa ste 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni lus dang sems kyi rgyud snyon rmongs par byed pa ni nyon mongs pa ste 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
translated: The afflictions are desire and so on, which stupefy the continuum of body and mind.

original: de dag gi stobs lhag par che bas de'i mthus 'gro ba thams cad la rigs pa dang mi rigs pa dang / phan pa @197a * //
analyzed: de dag gi stobs lhag par che bas de'i mthus 'gro ba thams cad la rigs pa dang mi rigs pa dang / phan pa @197a * //
translated: By the power of those, one does not know what is right and wrong, what is beneficial and harmful, what is heavy and light, and so on, for all beings.

original: dang ; mi phan pa dang / lci ba dang yang ba la sogs pa thams cad mi shes pa la sogs pa de la mi gtsang ba la sogs pa bsgoms pas 'jig rten gyi lam gyis yongs su sbyangs pa ste /
analyzed: dang ; mi phan pa dang / lci ba dang yang ba la sogs pa thams cad mi shes pa la sogs pa de la mi gtsang ba la sogs pa bsgoms pas 'jig rten gyi lam gyis yongs su sbyangs pa ste /
translated: That is purified by the mundane path through meditation on the impure and so on.

original: mngon par gzhil ba'o //
analyzed: mngon par gzhil ba'o //
translated: It is completely suppressed.

original: mdor na nyon mongs pa la dbang bas byang chub kyi yan lag gi dngos por 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: mdor na nyon mongs pa la dbang bas byang chub kyi yan lag gi dngos por 'gyur ba'o //
translated: In brief, because of mastery over the afflictions, they become the substance of the branches of enlightenment.

original: bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing //
analyzed: bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing //
translated: They render the powers of Mara powerless.

original: zhes bya ba la bdud ni lha'i bu la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la bdud ni lha'i bu la sogs pa ste /
translated: Mara is the son of the gods and so forth.

original: de dag gi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i bar chad byed nus pa de la mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis stobs med pa dang / mthu med pa dang / gnas med par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i bar chad byed nus pa de la mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis stobs med pa dang / mthu med pa dang / gnas med par byed pa'o //
translated: The power of those is able to create obstacles for the bodhisattva's conduct. By the power of the superknowledges, they are rendered powerless, ineffective, and groundless.

original: bzang po spyod pa'i stobs kun rdzogs par bgyi //
analyzed: bzang po spyod pa'i stobs kun rdzogs par bgyi //
translated: They perfect all the powers of good conduct.

original: zhes bya ba ni bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni gnyen po'i mi mthun phyogs rnams kyis mi tshugs shing /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni gnyen po'i mi mthun phyogs rnams kyis mi tshugs shing /
translated: The power of good conduct is not harmed by the discordant classes of antidotes.

original: mngon par 'du shes mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'du shes mi byed pa'o //
translated: It is not conceptualized.

original: de dag kun ma lus par rdzogs par bya ba ni gong du bshad pa'i rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa stobs bcu bshad pa dang / gang du smos pa'i gnyen po rnam gsum mo //
analyzed: de dag kun ma lus par rdzogs par bya ba ni gong du bshad pa'i rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa stobs bcu bshad pa dang / gang du smos pa'i gnyen po rnam gsum mo //
translated: To perfect all of those without exception is to complete the ten powers, such as the superknowledges, as explained above, and the three types of antidotes that are mentioned.

original: gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i las ni rnam pa bcu bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i las ni rnam pa bcu bzhi pa ste /
translated: The bodhisattva's activity is fourteenfold.

original: las de yang rnam pa brgyad do //
analyzed: las de yang rnam pa brgyad do //
translated: And that activity is eightfold.

original: zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing //
analyzed: zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing //
translated: Purifying the ocean of the fields,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: and so on. There are two verses.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: zhing rnams rgya mtsho zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhing rnams rgya mtsho zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Purifying the ocean of the fields and so on.

original: de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho bde ba can dang pad mo can ltar dag par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho bde ba can dang pad mo can ltar dag par byed pa'o //
translated: And that is purifying the ocean of buddha fields, like the Blissful Land and the Lotus Land.

original: de bzhin du 'khor ba na rgya nyon mongs pa'i lcags sgrog gis bcings pa'i sems can rgya mtsho snyed la rdzu 'phrul dang kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul rnam pa gnyis kyis mgu bar byas nas rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis skad cig tu rnam par grol bar
analyzed: de bzhin du 'khor ba na rgya nyon mongs pa'i lcags sgrog gis bcings pa'i sems can rgya mtsho snyed la rdzu 'phrul dang kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul rnam pa gnyis kyis mgu bar byas nas rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis skad cig tu rnam par grol bar
translated: Similarly, delighting the ocean of beings bound in the prison of cyclic existence by the two kinds of miracles, the miracle of power and the miracle of instruction, he liberates them in an instant.

original: byed pa'o // chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing //
analyzed: byed pa'o // chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing //
translated: Seeing the ocean of phenomena,

original: zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba'i chos rgya mtsho snyed dang / bshad pa'i chos rgya mtsho snyed shes rab kyi mig gis skad cig re re la yang mthong bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni thob par bya ba'i chos rgya mtsho snyed dang / bshad pa'i chos rgya mtsho snyed shes rab kyi mig gis skad cig re re la yang mthong bar bya'o //
translated: The Dharma to be attained is like an ocean, and the Dharma to be taught is like an ocean, and one should see them with the eye of wisdom in every moment.

original: shes par bya ba mtha' yas pas na ye shes kyang mtha' yas pa ste /
analyzed: shes par bya ba mtha' yas pas na ye shes kyang mtha' yas pa ste /
translated: Since the objects of knowledge are infinite, the wisdom is also infinite.

original: de bas na ye shes rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ste /🔽rab tu rtogs par byed @197b ces bya ba ni khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: de bas na ye shes rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ste / rab tu rtogs par byed @197b ces bya ba ni khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, it is called an ocean of wisdom.🔽One should understand it, i.e., penetrate it.

original: rtogs par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtogs par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means one should realize it.

original: spyod pa brgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / bzang po spyod pa gnyis dmigs kyis ma phye bas na gnyi ga gzung bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: spyod pa brgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / bzang po spyod pa gnyis dmigs kyis ma phye bas na gnyi ga gzung bar rig par bya'o //
translated: The conduct is like an ocean. Since the bodhisattva conduct and the good conduct are not distinguished, both should be understood as included.

original: de la byang chub kyi spyod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sgrub pa ste ye shes kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: de la byang chub kyi spyod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sgrub pa ste ye shes kyi tshogs so //
translated: Among them, the conduct of enlightenment is the accomplishment of the Buddha qualities, which is the accumulation of wisdom.

original: bzang po spyod pa yang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar byed pa ste bsod nams kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: bzang po spyod pa yang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar byed pa ste bsod nams kyi tshogs so //
translated: The good practice is the accumulation of merit, which consists of benefiting and gladdening all beings.

original: bzang po spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa gnyi ga yang byang chub bsgrub pa yin mod kyi /
analyzed: bzang po spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa gnyi ga yang byang chub bsgrub pa yin mod kyi /
translated: Both the good practice and the bodhisattva practice are indeed the means of attaining enlightenment.

original: mngon sum dang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa tsam zhig bye brag yod do //
analyzed: mngon sum dang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa tsam zhig bye brag yod do //
translated: But there is a difference in that the former is direct and the latter is indirect.

original: spyod pa rgya mtsho dag mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis skad cig ma re res rnam par dag par byed pa ni dri ma med par byed pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa rgya mtsho dag mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis skad cig ma re res rnam par dag par byed pa ni dri ma med par byed pa'o //
translated: The purification of the ocean of practices by the power of the superknowledges in every instant is the purification of the stain.

original: smon lam rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma re re la tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus rdzogs par byed pa'o ;
analyzed: smon lam rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma re re la tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus rdzogs par byed pa'o ;
translated: The ocean of vows is the fulfillment of morality and samadhi in every instant by the power of the vow.

original: / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho phyogs bcu nas mchod pa'i sprin gyis nam mkha' khyab par skad cig gis rab tu mchod pa'o //
analyzed: / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho phyogs bcu nas mchod pa'i sprin gyis nam mkha' khyab par skad cig gis rab tu mchod pa'o //
translated: The ocean of buddhas is the worship of the buddhas who fill the sky with clouds of worship in every instant.

original: bskal pa rgya mtshor mi skyo spyad par bgyi //
analyzed: bskal pa rgya mtshor mi skyo spyad par bgyi //
translated: I will practice without weariness for an ocean of eons.

original: zhes bya ba ni mi skyo ba'i yid kyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni mi skyo ba'i yid kyis so //
translated: This is with an undaunted mind.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su slob par bsngo ba ni rnam pa bco lnga pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su slob par bsngo ba ni rnam pa bco lnga pa ste /
translated: The dedication to training in the way of the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas is the fifteenth aspect.

original: de yang rnam pa gnyis so //
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gnyis so //
translated: And this is twofold.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob par bsngo ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob par bsngo ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the dedication to training in the way of the Tathagatas?

original: gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba yi //
analyzed: gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba yi //
translated: The victors who have gone in the three times

original: zhes bya ba la sgos pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sgos pa ste /
translated: This is the general dedication.

original: gang rgyal ba dus gsum du gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam gyi khyad par de dag thams cad bdag gis ma lus par rdzogs par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang rgyal ba dus gsum du gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam gyi khyad par de dag thams cad bdag gis ma lus par rdzogs par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: All the special practices and vows of the victors who have gone in the three times, I shall complete all of them without exception.

original: yongs su rdzogs shing rab tu chud par bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs shing rab tu chud par bya'o //
translated: One should complete them and fulfill them.

original: bzang po spyod pas zhes bya ba ni bzang po spyod pas so //
analyzed: bzang po spyod pas zhes bya ba ni bzang po spyod pas so //
translated: The good practice is the good practice.

original: byang chub sangs rgyas nas zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas par bya ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sangs rgyas nas zhes bya ba ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas par bya ba'o //
translated: Having attained enlightenment,having attained unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: lus dang gang dang yid rnams kyi spyod pa dang zhing dang smon lam rnams rnam par dag pas 'phags pa kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su slob par bsngo ba ste /
analyzed: lus dang gang dang yid rnams kyi spyod pa dang zhing dang smon lam rnams rnam par dag pas 'phags pa kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su slob par bsngo ba ste /
translated: The dedication is to train in the conduct, field, and aspiration prayers of the body, speech, and mind of the noble Samantabhadra and other bodhisattvas through the purity of one's own conduct, field, and aspiration prayers.

original: tshigs bcad gsum mo //
analyzed: tshigs bcad gsum mo //
translated: There are three verses.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: sras kyi thu @198a * //
analyzed: sras kyi thu @198a * //
translated: The eldest son,

original: bo pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: bo pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: and so on.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzang po spyod pa gang yin pa dang / de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ji snyed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa dang / mdor na byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan la sogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa ni 'phags pa kun du bzang po byang chub sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzang po spyod pa gang yin pa dang / de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ji snyed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa dang / mdor na byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan la sogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa ni 'phags pa kun du bzang po byang chub sems dpa' ste /
translated: The noble Samantabhadra is the bodhisattva who has perfected all the good conduct of the bodhisattvas, all the liberations of the bodhisattvas, all the samadhis, and in short, all the qualities and so on of the bodhisattvas.

original: de bas na sras kyi thu bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na sras kyi thu bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, he is called the eldest son and so on.

original: de ltar // rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo ni //
analyzed: de ltar // rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo ni //
translated: the chief of the sons of all the Victors

original: 'phags pa kun du bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa kun du bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o //
translated: is the noble great being called Samantabhadra.

original: mkhas pa de dang zhes bya ba ni de nyid la mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas pa de dang zhes bya ba ni de nyid la mkhas pa'o //
translated: The wise one is the one skilled in that.

original: mtshungs par spyad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mthun par spyad pa ste /
analyzed: mtshungs par spyad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mthun par spyad pa ste /
translated: Because of similar practice, that is, because of concordant practice,

original: ji ltar bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag thams cad skad cig re re la yongs su bsngo bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag thams cad skad cig re re la yongs su bsngo bar bya ba'o //
translated: one should thus dedicate all these roots of virtue, as they are taught, in every moment.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing //

translated: Many māras and many tīrthikas cannot overpower and suppress him.

original: mchod par gyur cig ces bya ba ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyis mchod par gyur cig pa ste /
analyzed: mchod par gyur cig ces bya ba ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyis mchod par gyur cig pa ste /
translated: May they be worshipped by all the three worlds.

original: gang gis @200a * //
analyzed: gang gis @200a * //
translated: By whom?

original: kun du bzang po'i spyod pa smon lam 'dzin cing ston pa'o //
analyzed: kun du bzang po'i spyod pa smon lam 'dzin cing ston pa'o //
translated: By those who hold and teach the vow of the conduct of Samantabhadra.

original: 'bras bus bsdus pa ni byang chub kyi snying por song ba dang / seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs par bstan pa dang / bdud rnams rab tu btul ba dang / mngon par byang chub ba ste /
analyzed: 'bras bus bsdus pa ni byang chub kyi snying por song ba dang / seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs par bstan pa dang / bdud rnams rab tu btul ba dang / mngon par byang chub ba ste /
translated: The result is included in the following: he goes to the site of enlightenment, sits on the lion throne, subdues Mara, and awakens.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: This is the characteristic of turning the wheel of the Dharma and so forth.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro //
analyzed: byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro //
translated: He quickly goes to the foot of the tree of enlightenment.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: And so forth.

original: bzang po spyod pa bla na med pa 'dis shin tu bsags pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis myur du 'gro'o //
analyzed: bzang po spyod pa bla na med pa 'dis shin tu bsags pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis myur du 'gro'o //
translated: By this unsurpassable good conduct, he quickly goes by the accumulation of the stores of merit and knowledge.

original: byang chub shing dbang drung zhes bya ba ni byang chub shing dbang gi drung du'o //
analyzed: byang chub shing dbang drung zhes bya ba ni byang chub shing dbang gi drung du'o //
translated: The foot of the tree of enlightenment is the foot of the tree of enlightenment.

original: song nas kyang skyil mo krung bcas te seng ge'i gdan la 'gro ba thams cad la bde zhing phan pa'i phyir 'dug nas bdud sde dang bcas pa rab btul te /
analyzed: song nas kyang skyil mo krung bcas te seng ge'i gdan la 'gro ba thams cad la bde zhing phan pa'i phyir 'dug nas bdud sde dang bcas pa rab btul te /
translated: Having gone there, he sat on a lion throne in the full lotus posture for the sake of the happiness and benefit of all beings, and subdued the hosts of demons.

original: de nas bla na med pa yang dag par byang chub tu sangs rgyas nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de nas bla na med pa yang dag par byang chub tu sangs rgyas nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Then, having attained perfect enlightenment, he turned the wheel of the unsurpassed Dharma.

original: mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ma lus par bstan to //
analyzed: mdor na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ma lus par bstan to //
translated: In brief, it teaches all the excellent qualities, mundane and supramundane, without exception.

original: de yang gang zhe na /🔽gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di //
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na / gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di //
translated: What are they?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said, Whatever is this aspiration of good conduct... and so forth.

original: gang gis bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di 'chang ba dang / ston pa dang / klog pa'i rnam par smin pa ni su gang gis shes she na /
analyzed: gang gis bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di 'chang ba dang / ston pa dang / klog pa'i rnam par smin pa ni su gang gis shes she na /
translated: Who knows the full ripening of those who possess, teach, and recite this aspiration of good conduct?

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
translated: Not by others such as śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: gtso bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen te /
analyzed: gtso bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen te /
translated: The Lord Buddha knows this well.

original: smon lam rin po che'i rnam par smin pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na /
analyzed: smon lam rin po che'i rnam par smin pa ji ltar mkhyen ce na /
translated: How does he know the maturation of the precious vow?

original: byang chub mchog la zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub mchog la zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is said, the supreme enlightenment.

original: bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog gi 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i byang chub mchog gi 'bras bu'o //
translated: The result is the supreme enlightenment, which is unsurpassed.

original: 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan yang ma lus par 'dir bshad par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan yang ma lus par 'dir bshad par rig par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood that all the good qualities of worldly perfection are explained here.

original: 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan ni 'di'i zhar gyis 'byung bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan ni 'di'i zhar gyis 'byung bar rig par bya'o //
translated: The good qualities of worldly perfection are to be understood as a by-product.

original: de bas na smon lam 'di la dogs pa dang som nyi ma byed cig ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na smon lam 'di la dogs pa dang som nyi ma byed cig ces bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, Do not doubt or hesitate in this vow!

original: da ni bsngo ba bstan pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: da ni bsngo ba bstan pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Now, the dedication is taught, beginning with the words,

original: 'jam dpal dpa' bos ji ltar mkhyen zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jam dpal dpa' bos ji ltar mkhyen zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Just as the hero Manjusri knows, etc.

original: 'jam dpal @200b gyis ji ltar mkhyen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos kyang de bzhin du ste /
analyzed: 'jam dpal @200b gyis ji ltar mkhyen pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos kyang de bzhin du ste /
translated: Just as Manjusri knows, and the Bodhisattva Samantabhadra also knows in the same way,

original: dge ba'i phung po 'di dag thams cad de dag gi rjes su bsngo zhing slob pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsngo ba'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i phung po 'di dag thams cad de dag gi rjes su bsngo zhing slob pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsngo ba'o //
translated: This dedication of all these heaps of virtue in their aftermath is the bodhisattva's dedication.

original: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngo ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngo ba ste /
translated: This is the Tathagata's dedication.

original: dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba ba thams cad kyis //
analyzed: dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba ba thams cad kyis //
translated: All the Victorious Ones of the three times

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: and so forth.

original: dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bla na med pa mchog tu bsngo bar bsngags shing bstod pa ste /
analyzed: dus gsum gshegs pa'i rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bla na med pa mchog tu bsngo bar bsngags shing bstod pa ste /
translated: All the Victorious Ones, the Blessed Ones of the three times, praise and extol this unsurpassed, supreme dedication.

original: de ltar bdag gis bsngo ba ni bla na med pa mchog kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i dge ba'i tshogs 'di kun kyang de ltar ro //
analyzed: de ltar bdag gis bsngo ba ni bla na med pa mchog kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i dge ba'i tshogs 'di kun kyang de ltar ro //
translated: Thus, this unsurpassed, supreme dedication of all these heaps of virtue of the practice of Samantabhadra is just like that.

original: 'di la tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis ni sdig pa'i sgrib pa spong ba'o //
analyzed: 'di la tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyis ni sdig pa'i sgrib pa spong ba'o //
translated: Here, the first half of the verse is about abandoning the obscurations of evil.

original: phyed kyis ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i lus yongs su gzung ba'o //
analyzed: phyed kyis ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa'i lus yongs su gzung ba'o //
translated: The second half is about taking on a body that accords with the perfections.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: At the time of my death and so forth.

original: 'chi bar byed pa ni 'chi ba ste /
analyzed: 'chi bar byed pa ni 'chi ba ste /
translated: Death is that which causes death.

original: 'chi ba'i dus su bzang po spyod pa la gang gis bsgribs par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa de thams cad phyir bsal ba'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i dus su bzang po spyod pa la gang gis bsgribs par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa de thams cad phyir bsal ba'o //
translated: At the time of death, all the obscurations that would obscure the performance of good actions are removed.

original: mngon par mthong zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas mngon sum du mthong ba'o //
analyzed: mngon par mthong zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas mngon sum du mthong ba'o //
translated: Seeing means seeing the Bhagavat Amitabha in actuality.

original: der zhes bya ba ni bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba la bya'o //
analyzed: der zhes bya ba ni bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba la bya'o //
translated: There means going to the world of Sukhavati.

original: der song nas zhes bya ba ni bde ba can gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der stong ba ste /🔽ji ltar smras pa bzhin smon lam du gdab pa de kun bdag gis mngon sum du rdzogs par gyur cig pa'o //
analyzed: der song nas zhes bya ba ni bde ba can gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der stong ba ste / ji ltar smras pa bzhin smon lam du gdab pa de kun bdag gis mngon sum du rdzogs par gyur cig pa'o //
translated: Having gone there means having gone to the Buddha-field of Sukhavati.🔽May I fulfill all those aspirations just as they have been expressed.

original: de dag ma lus bdag gis yongs su bskang //🔽ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag ma lus bdag gis yongs su bskang // ces bya ba ni /
translated: May I completely fulfill all those aspirations.

original: sems can thams cad la 'di lta bu phan par bya ba'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la 'di lta bu phan par bya ba'o //
translated: This is how one should benefit all sentient beings.

original: ji srid du zhe na /
analyzed: ji srid du zhe na /
translated: For how long?

original: 'jig rten ji srid ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten ji srid ces bya ba ste /
translated: For as long as the world exists.

original: 'jig rten ji srid par 'gro ba rnams kyi don bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten ji srid par 'gro ba rnams kyi don bya ba'o //
translated: and the benefit of beings for as long as the world exists.

original: lhag ma ni lung bstan pa thob pa dang / sems can gyi don sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: lhag ma ni lung bstan pa thob pa dang / sems can gyi don sgrub pa ste /
translated: The rest is the attainment of prophecy and the accomplishment of the benefit of beings.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The circle of victors, etc.

original: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa'o //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa'o //
translated: The circle of victors is the assembly of retinue of the Tathagata.

original: bzang po zhes bya ba ni mjes pa'o //
analyzed: bzang po zhes bya ba ni mjes pa'o //
translated: Excellent means beautiful.

original: dga' ba zhes bya ba ni yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'o //🔽padmo dam pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dga' ba zhes bya ba ni yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'o // padmo dam pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Delightful means pleasing to the mind.

original: padmo dam pa'o //
analyzed: padmo dam pa'o //
translated: The excellent lotus is the excellent lotus.

original: mdzes zhes bya ba ni rin po che sna tshogs las byas pas @201a * //🔽'tsher ba'o // skyes zhes bya ba ni mngon du byung ba'o //
analyzed: mdzes zhes bya ba ni rin po che sna tshogs las byas pas @201a * // 'tsher ba'o // skyes zhes bya ba ni mngon du byung ba'o //
translated: Beautiful means shining with various jewels.🔽Arisen means manifested.

original: lung bstan zhes bya ba ni lung bstan pas na lung ston pa ste /
analyzed: lung bstan zhes bya ba ni lung bstan pas na lung ston pa ste /
translated: The prophecy is the prophecy.

original: dus 'di na 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya bar lung ston pa ste /
analyzed: dus 'di na 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya bar lung ston pa ste /
translated: At this time, in a certain world system, the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Fully Enlightened One, will prophesy the enlightenment of a Bodhisattva.

original: bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas las bdag gis lung bstan pa mngon sum du thob par bya'o snyam pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas las bdag gis lung bstan pa mngon sum du thob par bya'o snyam pa'o //
translated: I shall actually receive the prophecy from the Lord Amitabha.

original: der ni zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas las lung bstan pa rab tu thob nas /
analyzed: der ni zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas las lung bstan pa rab tu thob nas /
translated: There means that, having received the prophecy from the Lord Amitabha,

original: bye ba brgya phrag du mar sprul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu kun du khyab par sprul nas /
analyzed: bye ba brgya phrag du mar sprul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi sprin gyis phyogs bcu kun du khyab par sprul nas /
translated: by means of the cloud of emanations, which is the magical emanation of many hundreds of thousands of millions, he pervades all the ten directions with emanations.

original: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i rnam pa mang po grangs med tshad med pa skad cig gis so sor thams cad du byed pa ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i rnam pa mang po grangs med tshad med pa skad cig gis so sor thams cad du byed pa ste /
translated: In an instant, he performs for all sentient beings the many kinds of benefit, which are innumerable and unlimited, in every place.

original: blo yi stobs kyis zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi mthu chen po ste /
analyzed: blo yi stobs kyis zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi mthu chen po ste /
translated: By the power of mind means by the power of great knowledge.

original: mi chags shing thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mi chags shing thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means without attachment and without obstruction.

original: 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po'i bshad pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po'i bshad pa /
translated: The Commentary on the King of Prayers, the Prayer of Good Conduct

original: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: by Master Dignāga is complete.
